summary: This document is an email chain forwarded by attorney Stacey Richman, containing a threatening text message sent to Mark L. Epstein. keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received a direct death threat via text message on May 24, 2020.
The threat targeted Epstein, his family members, his children, and a person named 'Mrs. Anderson'.
Attorney Stacey Richman of the Law Offices of Richman Hill & Associates was involved, having the threat forwarded to her, indicating potential legal proceedings or security concerns.
The document is legal correspondence containing a confidentiality notice, suggesting the sensitive nature of the threat.
